alert.note: Alert for Logan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Warning issued March 05 at 5:44PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Fire Warning at the request of Oklahoma Forestry Services for northern Logan County. * AT 538 PM CST, a dangerous wildfire was located 4 miles west of Mulhall, moving rapidly to the east at 3 to 5 mph. * Areas impacted...the town of Mulhall and points to the west. * Additional Information...Those in the town of Mulhall near to evacuate to the north or south. $$ Mahale
info.instruction: Be prepared to evacuate quickly if requested and follow all safety instructions from local emergency management officials. Do not drive into smoke. Firefighters and incident responders should anticipate extreme fire behavior including a wind-driven and torching fire, and expect a northwesterly wind shift to impact the fire at approximately between 6:45 and 7:30 PM.
